{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about the first nerve fiber present in the vicinity of dental papilla. This document suggests that the innervation in dentine and pulp was not uniform, with most numerous nerve endings found in the pulp horn, and tubular dentine of the cusp and cervical regions. There is no mention of the developmental stages of tooth formation in this document. Therefore, we cannot conclude which stage (A-D) corresponds to the first nerve fiber present in the vicinity of dental papilla.", "answer_choice": C}
